snippet: Adara Media, Mountain View, Calif., hired four executives: Jeff Cohen, vice president for strategic accounts; Brandon Meyers, sales director; Mark Hersch, vice president for strategic accounts, and Andrew Freedman, regional sales director for the...
lead_paragraph: Adara Media, Mountain View, Calif., hired four executives: Jeff Cohen, vice president for strategic accounts; Brandon Meyers, sales director; Mark Hersch, vice president for strategic accounts, and Andrew Freedman, regional sales director for the eastern region.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
